topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f353146368720787d00e00#post_54f353146368720787d00e00
Real talk: There is basically no way getting rid of this person isn't going to be a fucking ordeal and a half. You will come to envy Sysyphus and his boulder.

The best advice I can give is to bore the shit out of them. Give them nothing interesting to make drama out of and refuse to engage them when they start drama.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f3518d6368726c131b1300#post_54f3518d6368726c131b1300
My issue with Eva isn't Shinji's issues, it is the fact there is nothing in the story to make me care about his issues. Every character is a bastard and the stakes go from reasonable to bizarrely abstract pretty much as a matter of course.

My feelings might be different if I hadn't had much of it spoiled for me long before watching it.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f3664063687226aa621b00#post_54f3664063687226aa621b00

Only once has anyone tried to sell me a mixtape. Being a white female boots me out of the target demographic, I'd imagine.

A few of these huge guys formed a line in front of me and my mom and when we tried to push past they yelled something about my mom being abused by her older brother (????). Fuckin' weird.
